post_purchase_thank_you.preview_text: Your feedback helps us craft better. Share your experience and inspire others!
post_purchase_thank_you.plain_text:
Hi [Name],

We hope your MitthuuG order arrived safely and you're enjoying every crunchy, sweet bite!

It's been a few days since your delivery, and we'd love to hear how we did. Your feedback means the world to us — it helps us improve and inspires others to discover the joy of traditional, handcrafted snacking.

Could you take 2 minutes to share your experience?

👉 Leave a review: [REVIEW_LINK]

As a thank you, we'll send you a special discount code for your next order once you submit your review.

What we'd love to know:
• How did the bites taste?
• Did they arrive fresh and well-packaged?
• Would you recommend MitthuuG to friends?

Your honest thoughts (good or constructive) help us grow as a small, artisan brand. Every review is read by our team, and we genuinely appreciate your time.

Still snacking? Check out our other flavors or gift boxes for upcoming festivals!

Shop again: [LINK]

Thank you for choosing MitthuuG. We're honored to be part of your snack routine.

With gratitude,
The MitthuuG Team

P.S. Tag us on Instagram @mitthuug with your snack moment and we'll feature you on our stories!
